general.gigTitle: build, rebuild website development as full stack developer, front end developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Professional Wix, WordPress, Webflow Website Designer and Developer
sellerCard.description: Hi, I am an expert and highly experienced web designer. I have been creating websites for over 5 years, so I know all the intricacies of website design from domain registration to customization in Shopify, Wix, WordPress, Webflow, Squarespace, GoDaddy, and other CMS platforms. I can design your website from scratch or redesign the existing one to acceptable modern standards. I can create a custom website to your liking, and make changes based on your requirements. I'll optimize your online store for mobile and desktop to make an impact online.

description.content:
Are you looking for a professional website developer to build and rebuild your desired website that meets all your requirements and exceeds your expectations?


Your one-stop solution is here!


As a full stack developer with years of experience, I can create a website that transforms your idea into a responsive, clean-coded, elegant-looking one. I will also redesign your website to maintain a professional look using advanced functionality with ongoing support and help.


I Can Work On:


  • HTML
  • CSS
  • PHP
  • Laravel
  • MySQL
  • MongoDB


What I Offer:


  • Complete Full Stack Development From Scratch
  • Attractive Design & Branding
  • Responsive for All Devices
  • Fronted Development 
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility
  • Figma to Website Conversion
  • SEO Friendly Optimization
  • Woocommerce Integration
  • Third-party API Integration


Why Me?


  • Highly Experienced
  • Excellent Communication
  • 24/7 Available
  • Ongoing Support


Take a smart step. Just place an order to get premium services.

slide.name: build, rebuild website development as full stack developer, front end developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I am not providing a hosting service with this project but If you need one I can help you to find hosting services.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Once the website is complete, can I update it myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, you can easily update it. If you don't know how to do it then I will provide you a short video to change page title, text, images, button etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What is the typical process for developing a web application?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: My process starts with requirement gathering and discussion, followed by creating a prototype and then developing the front end and back end. I also perform rigorous testing to ensure the application's functionality, security, and stability.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer Future support/help?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do that with all my clients. I can offer some guidance to help with your work.

openGraph.title: build, rebuild website development as full stack developer, front end developer

reviews.comment:
I want to take a moment to express my appreciation for the work you and your team have done so far. Your cooperation and efficiency in understanding the complexity of this project have been truly commendable. Initially, I was quite concerned about effectively conveying my expectations, but you exceeded them by working diligently to comprehend all my needs.

The progress made so far has gone beyond my initial expectations, and I sincerely hope that the next phase will continue to reflect the same level of proficiency and perfection.

Thank you once again for your hard work and dedication. 
Thank you Akibur and all your Staff

The work relation between my staff and Akibur staff it is an exemplar of the best possible relation when a complex project has to be created. We’re enjoying an exciting series of stages where you can see this project develop and materialize at its best 
expectations.

seller_response.comment: Thank you for your wonderful feedback! It has been an absolute pleasure collaborating with your team.

reviews.comment: Akibur Rahman's work on my website was OUTSTANDING, showcasing exceptional professionalism and a keen eye for detail. His cooperative spirit and politeness made the collaboration seamless, and I was truly impressed by his prompt delivery. Highly recommend! 🙌

seller_response.comment: It's a pleasure to work with you. Looking towards the upcoming projects and the long-term business relationship.

reviews.comment: I had specific preferences regarding the details, but the developer was incredibly patient and made sure that each of my requests was addressed seamlessly.

seller_response.comment: It was a pleasure working with you! Your clear communication ensured smooth progress throughout.

reviews.comment: Perfect job, nothing difficult for him, love to work with this guy. Thank you
